entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 12 April 2023
